seo.title: FAQ | Frequently asked questions
seo.description: Answers to frequently asked questions about our mobile cocktail bar services, bookings, pricing and more.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our mobile cocktail bar services, bookings and pricing.

snippetSection.title: Quick answers for your planning
snippetSection.subtitle: Quick answers for booking, pricing and logistics

0.question: How far in advance should I book?
0.answer: We recommend booking at least 4‚Äì6 weeks before your event. For weddings and large corporate events, plan 3‚Äì6 months ahead. For short-notice requests we‚Äôll do our best to help.

1.question: What‚Äôs included in the price?
1.answer: Our packages include the mobile bar, professional bartenders, spirits, mixers, ice, garnishes and equipment. Glassware and napkins are also included.

2.question: Do you offer non-alcoholic cocktails?
2.answer: Absolutely. We offer a wide selection of mocktails and non-alcoholic alternatives. They can be the main offer or served alongside alcoholic cocktails.

3.question: Which regions do you serve?
3.answer: We operate in Munich, Coburg and across Bavaria. For events outside Bavaria, contact us for an individual offer.

4.question: How many guests can you serve?
4.answer: From intimate celebrations with 20 guests to large corporate events with 500+ people ‚Äî we scale our setup to your guest count.

5.question: Can I customize the cocktail menu?
5.answer: Yes. We‚Äôre happy to create a tailored cocktail menu that matches your event theme, brand or taste preferences.

6.question: Does the mobile bar need power or water?
6.answer: No. Our Velo.Bar is fully self-sufficient ‚Äî no power outlet and no water connection required. Perfect for trade shows, outdoor events and venues with limited infrastructure.

7.question: How much does a mobile bar for 50 guests cost?
7.answer: A mobile bar for 50 guests starts at ‚Ç¨890 for 4 hours. This package includes professional bartenders, spirits, mixers, ice, garnishes, equipment and glassware. Pricing is transparent with no hidden costs.

8.question: Can you handle last-minute requests?
8.answer: Yes. Depending on availability we can realize events with as little as 48‚Äì72 hours notice. Give us a call ‚Äî we‚Äôll find a solution.

9.question: Do you offer sustainable event options?
9.answer: Yes. We work with regional Bavarian distilleries, use zero-waste garnishes and deliver carbon-neutral by cargo bike. After each event you‚Äôll receive a sustainability certificate for your ESG reporting.

0.question: How far in advance should I book a mobile cocktail bar?
0.answer: We recommend booking at least 4‚Äì6 weeks before your event. For weddings and large corporate events, plan 3‚Äì6 months ahead. Last-minute bookings up to 1 week before are possible depending on availability.

1.question: How much does a mobile bar for 50 guests cost?
1.answer: A mobile bar for 50 guests starts at ‚Ç¨890 for 4 hours. This includes professional bartenders, spirits, mixers, ice, garnishes, equipment and glassware. Transparent pricing with no hidden costs.

2.question: Can I book last-minute catering in Munich?
2.answer: Yes. Depending on availability we can realize events with as little as 48‚Äì72 hours notice. We respond within 2 hours, even on weekends. Call us at +49 160 94623196.

0.question: Does the mobile cocktail bar need power or water?
0.answer: No ‚Äî our bicycle bar is 100% self-sufficient. No power, no water connection required. Works anywhere: in the office, on terraces or outdoors. Perfect for locations with limited infrastructure.

1.question: How much space does a mobile cocktail bar need?
1.answer: Only about 2 square meters of space is required for our compact bicycle bar. It fits in any room or on any terrace ‚Äî ideal for tight venues or as an extra eye-catcher.

2.question: How long does setup take?
2.answer: Setup takes only 30‚Äì45 minutes. We arrive 1‚Äì2 hours before the event. Teardown happens after the event and takes about 30 minutes.

0.question: Which cocktails work best for corporate events?
0.answer: Popular corporate-event cocktails: Aperol Spritz, Gin & Tonic, prosecco with berries, mojito. These take 30‚Äì60 seconds per drink, enable high throughput and appeal to most guests. We can also create tailored signature drinks.

1.question: Do you offer non-alcoholic cocktails?
1.answer: Absolutely. We offer a wide range of mocktails and alcohol-free alternatives with premium non-alcoholic spirits. They can be the main offer or served alongside alcoholic cocktails.

2.question: Do you offer trade show catering in Munich?
2.answer: Yes. We specialize in trade show catering in Munich. Whether BAUMA, ISPO or EXPO REAL ‚Äî our self-sufficient bar works without trade show infrastructure. You save ‚Ç¨400‚Äì750 in power/water connection costs.

0.question: Is Velo.Bar sustainable?
0.answer: Yes. We are carbon-neutral: delivery by cargo bike, regional spirits, zero-waste garnishes and no water usage. After each event you receive a sustainability certificate for your ESG reporting.

1.question: Do you work with regional products?
1.answer: Absolutely. We use gin from the Chiemgau, whisky from Franconia and herbal liqueurs from the Alps. Short supply chains, local value creation and authentic Bavarian flavor.

0.question: Do you cater Christmas parties?
0.answer: Yes. We offer special winter cocktails such as virgin mulled wine, hot apple cider and cranberry fizz. Book 8+ weeks in advance for Christmas parties in Munich ‚Äî the season fills up fast.

1.question: Can you handle outdoor events without power?
1.answer: Perfect for us. Our battery setup enables 8+ hours of operation without an outlet. Summer festivals in the park, company outings by the lake, team events in nature ‚Äî anywhere without infrastructure.

hero.title: We are Velo Bar
hero.subtitle: Founded with the vision to bring premium cocktails on wheels. A passion for quality, craftsmanship and bar experiences that stick in your mind.

story1.heading: The story
story1.p1: What started as an idea ‚Äî "How do we bring bar-quality to trade shows and corporate events?" ‚Äî is now an established company with 500+ events for clients in Munich and Coburg.
story1.p2: If guests can‚Äôt come to the bar, we bring the bar to them. That vision made us what we are today: specialists in premium cocktail catering for corporate events.

story2.heading: Why we‚Äôre the right choice for your event
story2.p1Strong: You can relax ‚Äî we take care of the bar & drinks.
story2.p1: Smooth operations, an experienced team, reliable service. You focus on your event ‚Äî we deliver the bar experience.
story2.p2Strong: Your guests get premium cocktails, not standard mixes.
story2.p2: We invest in top spirits, trained bartenders and handcrafted drinks. Quality you can taste.
story2.p3Strong: Your event feels professional, but not stiff.
story2.p3: Lars brings 10 years of international bartender experience; Sebastian brings Bavarian hospitality and local Munich expertise. Together we‚Äôre the perfect duo.

team.heading: The team
team.p1Strong: Lars (North) + Sebastian (South) = the perfect duo for Munich
team.p2: "Moin" meets "Servus" ‚Äî international bartender experience meets local roots. Our different backgrounds complement each other and create a unique mix of professionalism and warmth.
team.p3: With 500+ successful events for companies like BMW, Siemens and innovative startups, we‚Äôve proven our vision works. Every event is a chance to show premium bar craftsmanship.

consumerDispute.title: Consumer dispute resolution / universal arbitration board

paragraphs.0: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws (¬ß 7 para. 1 TMG). However, according to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. Liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. If we become aware of any such infringements, we will remove this content immediately.

Our offer contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time they were linked. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. Permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. If we become aware of any infringements, we will remove such links immediately.

The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are permitted only for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. If we become aware of infringements, we will remove such content immediately.

The customer has the right to withdraw from the contract at any time. Unless further written agreements have been made between the customer and the Lars Eggers & Sebastian Reichstaller GbR, Lars Eggers & Sebastian Reichstaller GbR is entitled to reasonable compensation as follows:

listItems.0: 1) For a cancellation up to ten full working days before the first day of the event, 20% of the final quotation amount will be charged.
listItems.1: 2) For a cancellation between ten and three full working days before the first day of the event, 90% of the final quotation amount will be charged.
listItems.2: 3) For a cancellation less than three full working days before the first day of the event, 100% of the final quotation amount will be charged.

q1.question: How much does a mobile bar for a corporate event cost?
q1.answer: A mobile bar for corporate events starts at ‚Ç¨1,190 for 4 hours (50 guests). Premium packages with signature drinks and branding start at ‚Ç¨2,190. All prices include bartender, glassware, ingredients and equipment ‚Äì fully self-sufficient without power.

q2.question: How much space is needed for a mobile cocktail bar?
q2.answer: Only 2 m¬≤ of space is required for our bicycle bar. The compact mobile bar fits in any room or on any terrace. Ideal for limited locations or as an additional eye-catcher.

planning.title: Booking & cocktail selection
planning.intro: Key tips for planning your corporate event

q1.question: How far in advance should you book a mobile bar for corporate events?
q1.answer: Book 4‚Äì6 weeks in advance for best availability. Last-minute bookings up to 1 week before are possible depending on capacity. Reserve earlier for peak season (Nov/Dec).

q2.question: Which cocktails work best for corporate events?
q2.answer: Popular corporate-event cocktails: Aperol Spritz, Gin & Tonic, prosecco with berries, mojito. These take 30‚Äì60 seconds per drink, enable high throughput and appeal to most guests.

logistics.title: Technical requirements & capacity
logistics.intro: Everything you need to know about location and guests

q1.question: Does the mobile bar need power or a water connection?
q1.answer: No. Our bicycle bar is 100% self-sufficient ‚Äì no power, no water required. Works anywhere, whether in the office, on a parking deck or outdoors. Perfect for challenging locations.

q2.question: How many guests can one mobile bar serve?
q2.answer: One bar serves up to 150 guests over 4 hours. For larger events we recommend a second bar. Our bartender mixes up to 120 cocktails per hour ‚Äì no waiting times.

items.1: Department events with learning value & fun
items.5: Incentive events with active participation instead of passive consumption

0.description: What should the workshop achieve? Better communication, creative problem-solving, building trust? We design the right workshop flow.

1.description: A structured agenda with learning objectives, practical exercises, team challenges and individual skill-building elements ‚Äì didactically sound.

2.description: We come to your premises or recommend inspiring workshop locations. Flexible setup for groups of 6‚Äì40 participants.

3.description: Each participant gets their own workstation with pro gear: shaker, jigger, ingredients and recipe cards ‚Äì like real bartenders.

4.description: Our experienced bartender trainer teaches techniques, moderates team challenges and creates ‚Äòaha‚Äô moments plus real team spirit.

5.description: Participants receive recipe cards (or certificates in the masterclass) and reflect together: what do we take back to the team?

learn.title: What you will learn in our workshops

0.text: shaking, stirring, muddling ‚Äì the core techniques

1.text: how to use gin, rum, vodka and tequila properly

2.text: mix mojito, margarita and negroni perfectly

4.text: create your own signature drinks together

occasions.title: Popular workshop occasions
occasions.note: Also for private groups: bachelor/ette parties, birthdays, friend groups!

0.question: Do we need prior experience?
0.answer: No ‚Äî our workshops are designed for beginners. We start with the basics and adjust the level depending on the package. Everyone can join in, from complete beginners to hobby bartenders.

1.question: Where do the workshops take place?
1.answer: We come to you! Whether it‚Äôs your office, a rented venue, or your home ‚Äî we bring all equipment. Alternatively, we also offer workshops at partner locations in Munich and Coburg.

2.question: How many people can participate?
2.answer: The ideal group size is 10‚Äì20 people. For larger teams (up to 40) we work with two trainers in parallel groups. Smaller groups (from 6 people) are possible on request.

3.question: Is this suitable as a team-building activity?
3.answer: Absolutely! Our team-building workshops strengthen communication, creativity and collaboration. With team challenges, cocktail competitions and shared wins we build team spirit in a fun way.

4.question: Can participants mix non-alcoholic options too?
4.answer: Yes ‚Äî for every cocktail we also offer an alcohol-free mocktail version. Participants can decide whether they want to mix with alcohol or alcohol-free.

5.question: Do participants receive a certificate?
5.answer: In the VIP bartender masterclass all participants receive a Velobar certificate. For the other workshops you‚Äôll get recipe cards to take home with all cocktails you learned.

0.quote: The best team event we‚Äôve ever had! Everyone loved it and we laughed a lot. The cocktails were fantastic too!
0.author: Julia Hoffmann

1.quote: Perfect team building. Our colleagues were still talking about the cocktail competition weeks later. Highly recommended!
1.author: Markus Bauer
